basic.description: This course provides undergraduate majors with an introduction to family-based, stress-focused mini-theories. The course provides a framework for understanding the differences between family patterns when families are centered on growth related themes and when they are pre-occupied with a variety of stressor events.
basic.subject: FAD
basic.title: Stress and Resilience in Individuals and Families

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Major status or instructor permission.
